Question
========
  
Which combination of factors gives the highest probability of rejecting the null hypothesis?

Answerlist
----------
* A large standard error combined with a large $\alpha$.
* A large standard error combined with a small $\alpha$.
* A small standard error combined with a large $\alpha$.
* A small standard error combined with a small $\alpha$.
